title: Orient Fevre by Lizzie Lynn Lee
description:
All she wants is a one-night stand. But when he discovers that she's his mate, he won't stop until he claims her as his forever.
Cat shifter Violet Cross has a penchant for trouble. When she breaks up with her fiancÃƒÂ©, Mac, and seeks some guilt-free, sweaty, hot sex at the local bar but ends up waking up the next morning married, Violet thinks she has hit an all-time low. Especially when she finds out the man sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s married is a dragon prince from the alÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Tarakh throne; a VIP passenger she must escort to the DÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Keghan system.

Levy Frye has been looking for his future queen for quite some time. When he sees the green-eyed feisty cat innocently proposing a one-night stand, he canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t simply let Violet slip away. He agrees on a quickie, but instead he finds his true soul mate. Levy vows to make Violet his forever. The tricky part is convincing the stubborn cat they belong together.
When lust and destiny collide, a weeklong game of cat-and-dragon hide-and-seek at Orient Fevre might prove to be the most feverish encounter of all.

Genre: Fantasy | Shapeshifter
